main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Pasadena, California on March 6, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting was later suggested to be caused by exhaust glow from a passing aircraft., Numerous visual reports were confirmed by Lt. Mann of the Pasadena Police Department., The object was observed for about fourteen minutes., The reliability of the observers was rated as very good., Multiple witnesses in the area described the object as red with bright white flashes.
sighted object: a silent, bright red object in the sky
witness description: residents of Pasadena including T/SGT Dewey Crow and Ens. Wagner
